text: "Run for Your Life" is a song recorded by Swedish singer Måns Zelmerlöw. It was released on 14 January 2014 as a digital download in Sweden.iTunes - Musik - Run For Your Life - Single av Måns Zelmerlöw It was released as the third single from his fifth studio album Barcelona Sessions (2014). The song was written by Zelmerlöw, Gavin Jones and Robert Habolin, who also produced the song. ==Live performances== Zelmerlöw has performed the song live on Musikhjälpen and Nyhetsmorgon.Måns Zelmerlöw - Run for your life (Live @ Musikhjälpen 2013) - YouTubeMåns Zelmerlöw Run for your life Live @ Nyhetsmorgon) - YouTube ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Run for Your Life" was first released onto YouTube on 17 January 2014 at a total length of three minutes and forty-one seconds. The video was directed by Robin Ehlde.Måns Zelmerlöw - Run For Your Life - YouTube ==Track listing== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label |- ! scope="row"| Sweden | 14 January 2014 | Digital download | Warner Music Sweden |- |} ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Måns Zelmerlöw songs Category:Songs written by Måns Zelmerlöw Category:Songs written by Robert Habolin Category:Warner Music Group singles Category:English-language Swedish songs
title: Run for Your Life (Måns Zelmerlöw song)
